title: Chaco Culture National Historical Park: Laws & Policies
body: Laws & Policies       Firearms Regulations Document type:  html   Superintendent's Compendium 2015  Document type: pdf (10.63 MB) Information on park-specific designations, permit requirements, closures, and other restrictions imposed under the discretionary authority of the Superintendent of Chaco Culture National Historical Park.   Chaco Archaeological Protection Site System Joint Management Plan (1983)  Document type: pdf (31 MB) This plan was written in 1983 by the Chaco Culture Interagency Management Group, which includes representatives of the National Park Service, Bureau of Land Management, Bureau of Indian Affairs, Navajo Nation, State of New Mexico, and the U.S. Forest Service. This plan provides guidelines for the identification, preservation, protection, and research at archaeological sites associated with the Chacoan Culture of the San Juan Basin.     1990 Amendment to the Chaco Archaeological Protection Site System JMP Document type:  pdf (2.9 MB) This 1990 amendment changes the 1983 joint management plan and budget proposal dealing with "Joint Management Plan Implementation", to make the National Park Service responsible for administration of archaeological protection sites on Navajo lands, and for requesting and distributing funds to the Navajo Tribe for the management of Navajo-related sites.
